hr.fer.zemris.java.gui.charts

Class BarChart

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.zemris.java.gui.charts.BarChart

  • public class BarChart
extends Object
    Class represents a bar chart. Bar chart is chart in first quadrant with y values of each x value is represented with a column with height y.
    Author:
    Vilim Starove≈°ki
